question: Some people believe that nowadays we have too many choices to what extent do you agree or disagree
text: It is undeniable fact that due to excessive exploration in every field, people have a large number of options in their life. I completely agree with this part and will discuss the reason behind this by giving an example regarding that.

To embark, if we see around us in our daily life there are many people who keep on discovering the new opportunities in this world. For instance, if I talked about only of the field that it had created many choices for people other in terms of research or providing jobs to the youth of this world. It did is very well job in setting up an example for this. Moreover, with this Mass keep on contributing to these things for providing a bunch of much more options for the upcoming generation.

Next thing with Benefits that it may help in uplifting the unemployment rate and that may help everyone in this world because at that time everyone had a job in their activity. Furthermore, they may be happy to have such a thing in the life.

Well, if I talk about its negative sign lots of individuals consider this as a drawback sense if a man or a woman has that much alternative, then it would not be an easy task for them to select one of those preferences and you to dad and individual maybe can't choose one preferable thing for which he made up of.
In conclusion, I want to conclude that having a large number of choices is a good thing for everyone.
